messages.subject: Grandparent February Roundup
messages.msgSnippet: Time to recruit more members for my Grandparent Yahoo Group, GRANDleap (Learn-Explore-Adventure-Play)  We presently have 54 members (two of whom are Granddads)
messages.messageBody:
Time to recruit more members for my Grandparent Yahoo Group, GRANDleap
(Learn-Explore-Adventure-Play) We presently have 54 members (two of whom
are Granddads) since its August 22nd inception. So please ask your parents,
friends and relatives if they would like to take the GRAND LEAP and hop on
board our UNschooling adventure. It doesn't matter where they are in their
thinking or where they are in the world. We are all here to support each
other. Here's the link, thanks! http://groups.yahoo.com/group/GrandLEAP
Collette, moderator





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
